item1:
依使用者设定程序使用权限
Program authorization management for user
item2:
设定各个使用者的程序使用权限
Set program permissions for each user
item4:
已建立好使用者的基本数据
Basic user data has been created
item5:
使用者编码、使用者名称、部门名称
User ID, user name, department name
输出
item6:
程序数据、更新使用者授权档
Program data, update user authorization data
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的使用者数据，系统将提示查无此群组信息
If there is no matching user data, the system will prompt to find no such group information
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选使用者编码后点选Query查询使用者授权数据
Enter query conditions or select user code and click Query to query user authorization data
2. 从左边程序列表Add新增，或从右边程序授权列表Remove移除，可针对单一程序指定查询、打印、汇入、汇出、更新、删除、审批、是否使用等权限
Add from the left program list Add or remove from the right program authorization list Remove, you can specify permissions for a single program to query, print, import, export, update, delete, approve, use.
3. 点选功能菜单Save储存数据，完成操作
Click the function menu Save to save the data and complete the operation
4. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
5. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
后置条件
item9:
设定完权限后需重新登入系统方可生效
After setting permissions, you need to log in to the system again to take effect.
备注
